title: Anyone else having this bug?
body:
Every few games or so, when I enter the pre-game loading screens, it disconnects me and I have to reconnect. It's not too big a deal but it could possibly cause some issues and accidental remakes.

I've had this bug ever since the new patch. Anyone else having this issue?

replies.body: Not as bad as not being able to last second pick a champ (or even within 5 seconds) because it experiences an error, so you get a dodge penalty

There's a another annoying thing I'm experiencing with the new client, every time I go into champion select I get a black screen for about 10 seconds before I finally load in, makes me miss calling a lane which is really annoying.
It's like they've added the functionality, but deliberately made it dc every second game so you can see that they've done it.... so annoying hahaha

Yup, I've been having this issue too. It's nice that the new client lets you reconnect without having to relog but it's still annoying that it happens in the first place

Edit: It is a [known issue](http://puu.sh/sJWAj/a7356dcc5a.png), hopefully it gets fixed soon
